problem.markdown:
>>Which District had the lowest number of facility-based deliveries?<< [[Cat District, Fruit District, Game District, (Sweet District)]]
[explanation] Sweet District had the lowest number of facility-based deliveries [explanation] --- >>During which quarter was the absolute lowest number of facility deliveries recorded?<< [[(January - March 2016), April - June 2016, July - September 2016, October - December 2016]]
[explanation] During January - March 2016 the lowest number of facility deliveries were recorded [explanation]
problem.p: Which District had the lowest number of facility-based deliveries?

optioninput.label: Which District had the lowest number of facility-based deliveries?

div.p: Sweet District had the lowest number of facility-based deliveries

problem.p: During which quarter was the absolute lowest number of facility deliveries recorded?

optioninput.label: During which quarter was the absolute lowest number of facility deliveries recorded?

div.p: During January - March 2016 the lowest number of facility deliveries were recorded
